url.description: Target URL of the HTTP request

headers.description: Headers to use when sending the requests. e.g. {"Content-Type": "application/json"}

auth_username.description: Username for Basic and Digest authentications

auth_password.description: Password for Basic and Digest authentications

data.description: The body to attach to the request

json.description: The JSON to attach as body of the request

params.description: Query string parameters to append to the URL

fail_on_http_error.description: Fail when the HTTP query returns in error. Default to true.

verify_ssl.description: Wether the SSL certificate must be verified. Default to true.

description: Requests a resource at a specified URL and returns the response as Raw or JSON
name: Request URL

reason.description: Textual reason of responded HTTP Status, e.g. 'Not Found' or 'OK'.

status_code.description: Integer code of responded HTTP Status

url.description: Final URL of the triggered resource

headers.description: Headers used by the server in the response

elapsed.description: The amount of seconds elapsed between sending the request and the arrival of the response

text.description: Content of the response in unicode
